overview: Itâ€™s nice to be pretty in pink, but it is very inconvenient when you are a chameleon sunbathing on a branch and you spot a bird of prey high up in the air. But when the animal changes to leaf green, the misery really begins in this vivid clay animation. When a throbbing chainsaw fells the tree, the chameleon ends up in more tricky situations than there are colours in the rainbow.
title: De kameleon
